title: Are We Living in a Video Game? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/14/21
itunes:title: Are We Living in a Video Game? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/14/21
description:
Guest host Connie Willis and video game creator Rizwan Virk discuss the Simulation Hypothesis, that proposes our physical reality is really a highly developed video game that can be changed or re-run to create multiple timelines.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
Guest host Connie Willis and video game creator Rizwan Virk discuss the Simulation Hypothesis, that proposes our physical reality is really a highly developed video game that can be changed or re-run to create multiple timelines.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:summary: An exploration of the hypothesis that our world is actually a sophisticated video game.
